Title: Black Guard
Legend: These fanatical warriors guard the rulers of the Darkling Covens. Armed with ebon halberds and clad in ensorcelled plate, they present an impassable and deadly obstacle to any who threaten their ward.

PitchBattleProfile.Notes: Battleline if general is DARKLING COVENS

Intro: Each model in a Black Guard unit is armed with an Ebon Halberd

Rules.Name: Battalions
Rules.Rule: BATTALIONS: This warscroll can be used in the following warscroll battalions: • Thrall Warhost

Rules.Name: Champion
Rules.Rule: CHAMPION: 1 model in this unit can be a Lordling. Add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of that model’s melee weapons.

Rules.Name: Standard Bearer
Rules.Rule: STANDARD BEARER: 1 in every 10 models in this unit can be a Standard Bearer. Add 1 to the Bravery characteristic of this unit while it includes any Standard Bearers.

Rules.Name: Musician
Rules.Rule: MUSICIAN: 1 in every 10 models in this unit can be a Drummer. Add 1 to charge rolls for this unit while it includes any Drummers.

Rules.Name: Steel And Sorcery
Rules.Fluff: Black Guard are often charged with protecting Sorceresses on the field of battle. In turn, they benefit from the shadowy arcane wards woven by their mistresses.
Rules.Rule: Steel and Sorcery: This unit has a ward of 4+ while it is within 3" of any friendly Sorceress units. In addition, friendly Sorceress units have a ward of 4+ while they are within 3" of any units with this ability.Designer’s Note: This does not include Sorceress on Black Dragon units.
